data.title: Locations for Garth Brooks drive-in theater event announced
data.meta_description: "This one guy came to me and said, 'Hey, look, we can put 300 drive-in theaters together if you will create a concert solely for the drive-ins. We can have families jump in the car, get them out on Saturday night," Brooks said on GMA.
data.text:
Last Thursday, country music legend Garth Brooks announced on Good Morning America that he would be hosting a concert event at drive-in theaters across the country on June 27th.

"This one guy came to me and said, 'Hey, look, we can put 300 drive-in theaters together if you will create a concert solely for the drive-ins. We can have families jump in the car, get them out on Saturday night," Brooks said on GMA.

Now, some of those locations have been announced.

Unfortunately, no Kern County locations were on the list. As of Monday, the closest location was the Skyline Drive-in in Barstow. However, additional locations could be added.

Tickets for the event go on sale on June 19th and will cost $100, which accounts for one passenger car or SUV.

Brooks warned fans that there aren't a lot of tickets, so they will need to act fast.

No Kern County locations are listed as part of the event, but there are several California locations (additional locations will be added):

Madera Drive-in: 201 East Lincoln Ave, Madera CA

Skyline Drive-in: 31175 Old Highway 58, Barstow CA

The Nighlight: 403 F Street, Los Banos CA

Lakeport Auto Movie Theater: 52 Soda Bay Road, Lakeport CA

Kilburn - San Juan Capistrano: 30743 Av La Pata, San Juan Capistrano CA

Sunset Drive-In: 255 Elks Lane, San Luis Obispo CA

Concerts in Your Car: 10 W Harbor Blvd, Ventura CA

West Wind Sacramento 6 Drive-in: 9616 Oates Dr, Sacramento CA

Alameda County Fairgrounds: Pop-Up Drive in Movies: 4501 Pleasanaton Ave., Pleasanton CA

Paramount Twin Drive-in: 7770 Rosecrans Avenue, Paramount CA

Mission Tiki Drive-in: 10789 Ramona Avenue, Montclair CA

South Bay Drive-In: 2170 Coronado Ave, San Diego CA

Full List of Theaters:
